inicio.presentacion: I am Braian Alejandro Aguilera, a fullstack developer focused on development

proyectos.proyecto_desc: I designed a unique portfolio for Lucas David Aguilera that reflected his personal brand and specific needs. From the prototype in Figma to the full development, I created a responsive landing page, optimizing both user experience and visual aesthetics. This project highlights the ability to turn requirements into effective digital solutions.

sobremi.descripcion: I am a passionate frontend developer, with a strong ability to transform ideas into attractive and functional interfaces. I specialize in creating intuitive user experiences tailored to client needs.
sobremi.servicio1_desc: I develop hand-drawn prototypes to visualize ideas and improve communication with clients.
sobremi.servicio2_desc: I design intuitive and attractive user interfaces in Figma, ensuring a smooth user experience.
sobremi.servicio3_desc: I transform prototypes into functional websites using the technologies I excel at.
sobremi.servicio4_desc: I transform prototypes into functional websites using appropriate technologies.

footer.subtitulo: Interested in collaborating or just want to say hello? Feel free to reach out!
